questions.question: Which of the following functions can a cognitive AI system perform?
What is the final step an AI debater system must take?
correct_answers: Respond to the opponent by listening to the opponent's arguments to then deliver a convincing rebuttal that refutes the opponent and further proves the case.

questions.question: Which of the following statements is correct about natural language processing (NLP)?
correct_answers: IBM Project Debater was a major step forward in the field of natural language processing.
Human language is complex, so machines require natural language processing systems to understand human language.

questions.question: Fill in the blank. A system that helps machines understand cultural knowledge, grammatical structures, and various language nuances is known as _____________________.
What term do AI researchers use to describe the collection of text and data they use to train a debater AI system?
Your friend says, “I really love anchovies and flowers.” How many relationships between entities can you find in this statement?
What is sentiment analysis?
correct_answers: A method to measure the strength of an emotion by assessing data as positive, negative, or neutral

questions.question: What type of problem does the following sentence create for an AI system?
How does an AI system that is working with human language handle the classification problem?

You’re consulting for a store that wants to know how customers feel about a new product line. You propose an AI system that can study how people feel about these products based on their comments in social media.
For a chatbot, what is an entity considered within the context of a question?
Which of the following is true about industries in which AI professionals work?
correct_answers: Most industries have already hired or are in the process of hiring AI professionals.

questions.question: What is the primary job role of a business intelligence developer?
correct_answers: To analyze complex data, looking at business and market trends to increase profitability of their organization

questions.question: Which AI professional specializes in human language and works on voice assistants and speech recognition?
You’re in a job interview and you are asked to describe your advanced AI technical skills. What set of skills should you elaborate on?
You’re applying for an entry-level job as an AI professional. The interviewer asks you about your workplace skills. Which of the following skills should you elaborate on?
When developing explanations for the output of an AI model, it is important to remember that explanations must ___________ depending on the user persona.
Which of the following is an example of poisoning in the AI context?
correct_answers: Updating features and labels of the training data
Injecting malicious samples into the training data
Corrupting test data sent to the deployed model

questions.question: Fill in the blank. A distinguishing feature of generative AI, as opposed to other types of AI, is its ability to ___________.
When you selected the CSV file in All assets, what did you see?
correct_answers: A preview of the data to be used when training your model

questions.question: Which of the following describes how information flows through the nodes of a perceptron in a neural network?
correct_answers: Information flows from the input layer to the hidden layers, where algorithms are applied, and then to the output layer.

questions.question: What term do AI researchers use to describe the collection of text and data they use to train a debater AI system?
Which of the following pillars of AI is exemplified by anyone being able to describe how an AI system makes a prediction or recommendation?
Which of the following business roles is responsible for the deployment of AI models?
In a poisoning attack, when does the adversarial attack occur?
Which of the following describes a robust AI system?
correct_answers: The AI system can effectively handle malicious attacks without causing unintentional harm.

questions.question: Which of the following is a limitation of generative AI?
What is sentiment analysis?
correct_answers: A method to measure the strength of an emotion by assessing data as positive, negative, or neutral

questions.question: Which of the following describes an AI system, that everyday people, who do not have any special training in AI, can understand how and why the system came to a particular prediction or recommendation?
